mapper.select: SELECT ( CASE WHEN ROUTE_NAME = "磨机线路（电）" THEN "电仪" ELSE "磨浮" END ) section, uploadResultTime AS time, devName AS equip, SC_PART AS part, SC_CONTENT AS spot, ID as id, RESULT AS value, ( CASE WHEN ALTPID = 1 THEN "二级" WHEN ALTPID = 2 THEN "一级" END ) level, (CASE WHEN alarm_flag="N" THEN '未处理' WHEN alarm_flag="Y" THEN '已处理' END) flag, std_value AS standard FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' OR ROUTE_NAME='浮选路线') AND ( devName = CONCAT("${equip}",'浮选机') OR devName = CONCAT('二厂浮选电机',"${equip}" ) or devName = CONCAT("${equip}",'电机') ) AND (ALTPID = 1 OR ALTPID = 2) AND date(TASKSTART_TM) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) ORDER BY uploadResultTime DESC;

SELECT (case when DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' THEN '设备' WHEN DEPT_NAME='磨浮生产' THEN '生产' WHEN DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' THEN '电仪' END )section, count(COMPLETESTATE = 'Y' OR NULL) AS checked, count(COMPLETESTATE = 'W' OR NULL) AS unchecked, count(ALTPID = 1 OR NULL) AS alarm, count(ALTPID = 2 OR NULL) AS danger FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' OR ROUTE_NAME='浮选路线') AND ( devName = CONCAT("${equip}",'浮选机') OR devName = CONCAT('二厂浮选电机',"${equip}") or devName = CONCAT("${equip}",'浮选机电机') )
AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now()) -- 当天数据 GROUP BY section

select '设备' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='轴承（上）' and SC_CONTENT='温度') THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='轴承（上）' and SC_CONTENT='润滑是否良好') THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='轴承（下）' and SC_CONTENT='温度' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='轴承（下）' and SC_CONTENT='润滑是否良好' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='皮带' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='风管' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='注油管' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='地脚螺栓' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a8', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='电流' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a9', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='主轴' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a10', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='定子' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a11', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='叶轮及盖板' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a12', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='其它' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a13'
FROM ( SELECT SC_PART,devName,SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN RESULT='运行不检' THEN RESULT WHEN RESULT='手工已检' THEN REMARK WHEN ((SC_CONTENT!='温度') AND (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) ) THEN '故障' WHEN ((SC_CONTENT!='温度') AND (ALTPID = 0)) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' AND ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' AND devName = "${equip}" -- AND TASKSTART_TM='2019-08-19' AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp

select '生产' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='浮选机' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='消泡水' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='泡沫' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='泡沫管、溜槽' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='其它' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a5' FROM ( SELECT SC_PART,devName,SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN RESULT='手工已检' THEN REMARK WHEN ( (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) ) THEN '故障' WHEN ( ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮生产' AND ROUTE_NAME='浮选路线' AND devName = "${equip}" -- AND TASKSTART_TM='2019-08-19' AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp

select '电仪' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT='测振' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT='测温' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT='有无异响' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_CONTENT='有无松动' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4' FROM ( SELECT SC_PART,devName,SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN RESULT='手工已检' THEN REMARK WHEN ( (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) ) THEN '故障' WHEN ( ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' AND ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' AND devName = CONCAT('二厂浮选电机',substring_index("${equip}",'浮', 1) ) -- AND TASKSTART_TM='2019-08-19' AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp

select '设备' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='轴承（上）' and SC_CONTENT='温度') THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='轴承（上）' and SC_CONTENT='润滑是否良好') THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='轴承（下）' and SC_CONTENT='温度' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='轴承（下）' and SC_CONTENT='润滑是否良好' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='皮带' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='风管' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='地脚螺栓' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a7', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='电流' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a8', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='刮板轴' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a9', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='刮板轴夹板' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a10', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='刮板轴U型垫' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a11', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='刮板轴消泡水管' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a12', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='浮选机刮板轴润滑水' ) THEN RESULT end ) as 'a13', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='主轴' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a14', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='定子' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a15', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='叶轮及盖板' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a16', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='其它' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a17'
FROM ( SELECT SC_PART,devName,SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN RESULT='运行不检' THEN RESULT WHEN RESULT='手工已检' THEN REMARK WHEN ((SC_CONTENT!='温度') AND (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) ) THEN '故障' WHEN ((SC_CONTENT!='温度') AND (ALTPID = 0)) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' AND ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' AND devName = "${equip}" -- AND TASKSTART_TM='2019-06-24' AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp
